amendment.description: Amendment requires the National Science Foundation to study ways to improve detection, investigation, and prosecution of cyber crimes including piracy of intellectual property, crimes against children, and organized crime.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-410 to require the National Science Foundation to study ways to improve detection, investigation, and prosecution of cyber crimes including piracy of intellectual property, crimes against children, and organized crime.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Matheson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
